channel.title: Talks By Sister Elaine Cannon
channel.description: General Conference talks by Sister Elaine Cannon.

item.title: If We Want to Go Up, We Have to Get On
item.description: President Kimball, brethren of the General Authorities who are here with us, thank you for this privilege and for your presence. And to you sisters across the waves of sound, our greetings and our love. To all of you radiant mothers and daughters gat

item.title: Our Mighty Errand
item.description: The sweep of our sisterhood touches me as I talk from Temple Square across the English-speaking world to you women who love the Lord and who have gathered together to learn more about him and his will for us as women. I remember our many nonâ€“English-
